title: permanent ban for using a VPN for better internet connection
body: i really wonder how i got permanent ban for nothing ?? they said i am using scripting although the only thing i have used is a vpn cuz my country is banning now the online gaming they didn't even give me a warn or anything,   however their reply on the ticket is so ridiculous like a bot or machine they cant really delete 5 years of efforts easy like that  for a stupid mistake like this . i don't know how to proof i am innocent. but i am ready for  any kind of PC or client analysis they would ask  and even they can see i am suffering from connection issues since like one year by reviewing my ticker history. @Riot Tantram

replies.body: A program like a VPN wouldn't be punished for by our system, so it's likely something else triggered the system. We can't do much about scripting bans here on the boards, but if you continue talking with the agent is your ticket they should be able to explain the process. They won't be able to point out what exactly it was since that would obviously open a huge loophole for scripters to fix their programs and cover their tracks.
